Text:
This particular version (by Document) contains poor quality video up to 8 minutes from the start. The image is jittery, as if the framerate was less than 20. After that, it's ok. 

The movie itself is more or less interesting, depending if you like to watch two guys yakkity-yak for an hour and a half in the same room. Their convo gets better towards the end, especially Tommy Lee Jones' dark rant near the end.
